author: IGN
description:
The iconic SHINOBI returns in an all-new 2D action platformer with a unique hand-drawn look created by the team behind the hit brawler Streets of Rage 4.
SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance will be available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PC on August 29th.
title: SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance - Official Oboro Village Stage Trailer

description: Check out the teaser for the variant Chocobo cards in the Final Fantasy x Magic: The Gathering collab! Celebrate the fleet-footed, feathered friends from FINAL FANTASY as you look for Colorful Chocobo cards, and even the headliner: the Serialized Golden Chocobo card. The Final Fantasy x Magic: The Gathering set releases June 13, 2025!

author: IGN
description:
Explore the hand-drawn high fantasy world of Little Mage in this teaser trailer for the upcoming 2D Metroidvania adventure game. The teaser trailer for Little Mage shows gameplay and more. Embark on a journey through the desolate city of Hornedrose and the Basilica, discovering secrets, acquiring new abilities and items, encountering unique enemies, and overcoming challenging bosses. Little Mage will be available on PC. A Kickstarter campaign is coming soon.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Little Mage - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered has been out for several weeks now, and the more gamers put time into it, the more problems they find. Our colleagues at Digital Foundry ran tests on all available versions of the game, and found significant performance issues on the console and PC versions. One of the worst issues would be a hard crash of the game that happens when loading the same save too many times, and a camera problem when playing the game for too long. There's also framerate hiccups all throughout the game across all versions. In slightly happier news, Tony Hawk wants a remake of Tony Hawk's Underground, the sub-franchise of the popular skating games that debuted in 2003. With the release of Tony Hawk's 3 + 4 later this year, we could be one step closer to another remake. And finally, Marvel's Thunderbolts*—sorry, Marvel's The New Avengers—remained number 1 at the domestic box office in its second weekend. The latest entry in the MCU dropped about
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered Has Problems Across the Board - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Check out the Version 1.0 Release Date Announcement Trailer for Dragon is Dead, a hack-and-slash action roguelike platformer RPG developed by TeamSuneat. Players will fight to overcome the repeated deaths to defeat Guernian, the leader of the Dark Dragons. Make use of and customize different character skill trees and legendary equipment in Dragon is Dead, launching on June 6 in Version 1.0 for PC (Steam).
title: Dragon is Dead - Official Version 1.0 Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss 'The Art of Warhammer Video Games' Art Book Trailer for Warhammer, the legendary wargame franchise. This upcoming artbook. published in collaboration with DK and Warhammer will bring fans iconic art from the franchise, including concept art, commentary from studio insiders, and art from the video games of Warhammer. The Art of Warhammer Video Games is releasing in November 2025 with pre-orders available now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Warhammer - Official 'The Art of Warhammer Video Games' Art Book Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We travel to PAX East to meet the Lead Designer (Jamie Stormbreaker) for Swap Meat, a rougelite game where you need to swap your meat with your enemies' meat to win the day. 

SWAP MEAT - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2790700/SWAPMEAT/
"Welcome to SWAPMEAT: A fast-paced co-op roguelite shooter where you rip through alien worlds, harvest mutant body parts, and steal their powers to become the best version of yourself."


Presented by The United States Air Force

#IGN #Gaming
title: What is this New Rougelite called "SWAPMEAT"? - PAX East

author: IGN
description: Check out the latest trailer for the Final Fantasy x Magic: The Gathering collab! The beloved FINAL FANTASY RPG series' sixteen mainline games of unforgettable characters, items, and moments are now here in  Magic: The Gathering! Cast powerful spells, call upon classic summons, and even visit your favorite locations on the back of a chocobo. Countless elements from the games are here for you to weave together your own story! Releases June 13, 2025!
title: Final Fantasy x Magic: The Gathering - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We travel to PAX East to check out the Devolver booth with JM Specht! 

Mcyopunk - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3247750/Mycopunk/
"A ragtag squad of robot rejects is hired by the SAXON corporation and given one last shot at profitable glory (and avoiding the scrap heap). They are the New Atlas Hazard Crew, a ramshackle squad of exterminators sent to uncover the mysteries behind a planet-wide fungal catastrophe.
Embark on a series of dangerous planet-side missions to drive back the mycological menace. Could this be a simple natural disaster like they claim? And did SAXON really misfile your taxes? Or was that your own fault?"

Botsu - https://store.steampowered.com/app/885160/BOTSU/ 
"ARE YOU READY TO BOTSU? It’s the ultimate robo-sport showdown! Compete online or split-screen in a series of ragdoll, physics-based battlesports to prove your mechanical mettle.

Select from dozens of event variants and face off in team-based competition to earn victorious XP and another highlight f
title: All The New Games at the Devolver Booth: PAX East

author: IGN
description:
So what's the story in Elden Ring: Nightreign? Check out a little overview of what Remembrances are and how they tell Elden Ring: Nightreign's story by revealing bits and pieces of each of the eight Nightfarer's backgrounds chapter by chapter.

#EldenRingNightreign #Gaming #IGN
title: Elden Ring: Nightreign - Remembrances Explained - IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Watch the opening scene from Murderbot, the new comedic thriller series starring and executive produced by Emmy Award winner Alexander Skarsgård and hailing from Academy Award nominees Chris and Paul Weitz. The ten-episode series will premiere globally on Apple TV+ with the first two episodes on Friday, May 16, 2025, followed by new episodes every Friday through July 11.

Based on Martha Wells' best-selling, Hugo and Nebula Award winning book series “The Murderbot Diaries,” Murderbot is a sci-fi thriller/comedy about a self-hacking security construct who is horrified by human emotion yet drawn to its vulnerable clients. Played by Skarsgård, Murderbot must hide its free will and complete a dangerous assignment when all it really wants is to be left alone to watch futuristic soap operas and figure out its place in the universe.

The ensemble cast also includes Noma Dumezweni, David Dastmalchian, Sabrina Wu, Akshay Khanna, Tattiawna Jones, and Tamara Podemski. 

Murderbot hails from Para
title: Murderbot: Exclusive Opening Scene (2025) Noma Dumezweni, David Dastmalchian, Sabrina Wu

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the PAX East 2025 Gameplay Demo for God Save Birmingham, an open-world zombie survival action game developed by Ocean Drive Studio. Players can watch the full PAX East 2025 gameplay demo that attendees got to play firsthand as players embody the lone survivor in a city overrun by the dead. Players must rely on their wits, their fists, and whatever they can arm themselves with to endure the nightmare. This gameplay demo is packed with exploration, looting, combat, and more for God Save Birmingham, coming soon to PC (Steam).

#GodSaveBirmingham #Gameplay #IGN
title: God Save Birmingham - Official PAX East 2025 Gameplay Demo

author: IGN
description:
The epic party continues at home as A Minecraft Movie debuts Digitally on May 13. From Warner Bros. Pictures and Legendary Pictures and starring Jason Momoa and Jack Black, A Minecraft Movie, directed by Jared Hess, is the first-ever big-screen, live-action adaptation of Minecraft, the best-selling video game of all time. 

A Minecraft Movie has taken the box office by storm, earning more than $872 million worldwide. It is the largest domestic opening for 2025 and the largest movie based on a video game.

On June 24, A Minecraft Movie will be available to own on 4K UHD, Blu-ray and DVD from online and physical retailers. A Minecraft Movie will also continue to be available in high definition and standard definition from participating digital retailers.
title: A Minecraft Movie: Exclusive Behind the Scenes Clip

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer #2 for F1, the upcoming racing action film distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures and Apple TV Plus. Take a look at the latest trailer where a legendary racer returns to the F1 racing series with a young up-and-comer as tensions rise and everything is on the line. F1 is releasing in theaters on June 27.

Dubbed “the greatest that never was,” Sonny Hayes (Brad Pitt) was FORMULA 1’s most promising phenom of the 1990s until an accident on the track nearly ended his career.  Thirty years later, he’s a nomadic racer-for-hire when he’s approached by his former teammate Ruben Cervantes (Javier Bardem), owner of a struggling FORMULA 1 team that is on the verge of collapse.  Ruben convinces Sonny to come back to FORMULA 1 for one last shot at saving the team and being the best in the world.  He’ll drive alongside Joshua Pearce (Damson Idris), the team's hotshot rookie intent on setting his own pace. But as the engines roar, Sonny’s past catches up with him and he finds
title: F1 - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Brad Pitt, Damson Idris, Kerry Condon, Javier Bardem
